Netarx identifies deep fake attacks. This plug-in is the chrome extension version and is useful for G-suite and Outlook Web Access. The Netarx Sensor is a separate app that is used for the thick version of Outlook and can be found on our website at netarx.com/home

By installing the Netarx Plug-in or Netarx Sensor on end-user devices, we can display a confidence value of a userâ€™s identity on all of your typical communication apps. We represent that confidence value on screen into a visual traffic light indication of threat:
if the communication is safe, it will be green
if there is a possible warning it will be yellow
If there is an alert it will be red

There are dozens of inputs currently go into our AI/ML models and eventually there will be hundreds. A few are highlighted below:
Frequency of communication
Email headers, DNS, SPF, DKIM
Device fingerprinting
User knowledge
Geo-location
IP Address
Modality / Communication type
